title: The Promise Ring - 30 Degrees Everywhere (1996) [FLAC]
description:
These young Wisconsin boys certainly know how to write sharp, powerful, and beautiful songs. 30Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â° Everywhere, the debut album from the Promise Ring, is still their best; it's basically straight-up pop/emo, very catchy, very intense, very powerful. Beautiful lyrics and melodies move from somber thoughts to moments that will make you smile in understanding. It's sort of like the soundtrack to a ride through your memories. Highly recommended.
